column3: This is not a NAK... but I don't really think this is much needed\n
Superceded by #1109.  Anything remaining should be on top of that.\n
How to get definitions for struct sockaddr_in and in_addr then?\n
This seems unnecessary: class CNetAddr after including netbase.h.\n
It was necessary when netbase.h included util.h.\n
Not needed for the header, I think? Maybe changes with IPv6...\n
